visualizer.display
Class OptimizingLayouts

java.lang.Object
  visualizer.display.OptimizingLayouts

public class OptimizingLayouts
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains static layout algorithms similar to the Layouts class. But OptimizingLayouts contains methods that try to arrange objects using optimization algorithms e.g. for a more intuitive table.

Author:
Rene Wegener
